/*! ========================================================= * Black Dashboard React v1.0.0 ========================================================= * Product Page: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/black-dashboard-react * Copyright 2019 Creative Tim (https://www.creative-tim.com) * Licensed under MIT (https://github.com/creativetimofficial/black-dashboard-react/blob/master/LICENSE.md) * Coded by Creative Tim ========================================================= * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. */ import React from "react"; // nodejs library that concatenates classes import classNames from "classnames"; // reactstrap components import { Button, ButtonGroup, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, Row, Col, Table, FormGroup, Input } from "reactstrap"; class Vault extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { bigChartData: "data1", } } setBgChartData = name => { this.setState({ bigChartData: name }); }; render() { var CP1 = ["0,00", "0,00"]; var CP2 = ["0,00", "0,00"] if (this.props.individualCPs.length > 0) { CP1 = this.props.individualCPs[0]; CP2 = this.props.individualCPs[1]; } return ( <>
{this.props.indexCP} Collateral Positions
ID Tokens Collateral ETH Liquidation rate
1 {(CP1[1]/10**20).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} {(CP1[0]/10**18).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} {((CP1[1]/10**20)/(CP1[0]/10**18)).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})}
2 {(CP2[1]/10**20).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} {(CP2[0]/10**18).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})} {((CP2[1]/10**20)/(CP2[0]/10**18)).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})}
Current rate: {(this.props.rateUSD/10**2).toLocaleString( undefined, {minimumFractionDigits: 2, maximumFractionDigits:2})}}
Create Collateral Position
{" "} USD Token amount Collateral details
Collateral amount Liquidation price Current Rate
0,00 0,00 200,00
); } } export default Vault;
